name: Garuda Studio
overview:
Garuda Studio is one of the largest providers of outsourced production services to the game and movie industries. Founded by one of the most experienced teams of game production specialists in Indonesia, Garuda Studio delivers high-quality digital entertainment production including graphic design, programming, level design and QA.

ADVERGAMES ———- It’s no secret that everyone from small businesses to large multi-national corporations are beginning see why advergames are such a powerful marketing tool.Approach a huge costumers with a funny game that will impress in their mind your Brand’s name.

Garuda is an award winning digital production studio with an international reputation. We conceive and create magical experiences across multiple digital platforms, with a specialism in branded games and digital properties that incorporate the principles of effective game design.

As well as publishing our own entertainment products, we collaborate with brands and their agencies to bring ideas to life and engage consumers in new and innovative ways.

Passion and dedication for what we do yields rewards for Garuda and our clients; if your brand needs a guiding light in the ever-changing digital landscape, we’d love to hear from you!
